Such is life in this wonderful global era. People from all over the world can go "what the fuck is this shit" at each other without even leaving their homes.

Oh well. I'm off to unload the pains and fears of my tortured soul on my therapist.

topics.body:
Today I was bringing in groceries from the garage with both hands full of groceries, so there's no way I can open the door handle to get in the house, plus the door is really strong in our garage for some reason

My dad was walking through the door already and it was starting to close, but I was too far away to get myself through in time, so I think it's a good idea to stop the door with my _bare feet_ before it closes

As soon as I got my foot in the doorway I immediately thought "shit this is a terrible idea"

You can guess what happened next
